name: Dot●◣Shape
description:
Try  logic game the Dot●◣Shape in minimalistic style . The game relaxed at first levels in process of passing turns into the real puzzle. Your brain will work for 100%. Activate dots, connect a line and build shapes. But don't forget: wider the corner -  more points!

It's new, unique gameplay. Only for inquisitive minds. Levels can be passed a set of ways.

Try, experiment, create! If you can play the game - your IQ is very high. Throw down a challenge to the intellect , open all modes of the game.

∷Characteristics

• 120 levels

• relaxed atmosphere

• 3 mods

• day/night option for care of yours  eyes

• minimalistic design

∷How to play?

• fill a field with one or several shapes. Points are given for quantity and value of corners.

• there аre levels where before building figures it is necessary to activate dots.

• At activation of the third dot in one sector it is necessary to begin to close a shape, or to move a dot.

• the shape can begin to be closed at any time from any active dot.

∷Future updates
• + 200 new levels
• + 5 new mods

At the moment the game is in development. I will be glad to feedback and suggestions.
